summary:
DWARFS RACE STYLED ON WARHAMMER AND LOTR LORE!
Custom steroids skeleton. Perfect with kill cams. Vampire and Werewolf transformations. Custom Race: Compatible. Also 4 unique dwarf followers
descriptionHtml:
EVER WANTED TO BE GOTREK OR THORIN WELL BY GRUGNI NOW YOU CAN MANLING.

MACHINIMA Dwarsf No. 3

[youtube]0-uksWrs2kc[/youtube]



~~~~INSTALLATI0N~~~: *DELETE OLD VERSION FIRST*. Use NMM to install. Or download manually then install it with NMM.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!FOLLOWERS LOOK UNDER HERE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

NEW VERSION 4: * Whole new esm so not safe and wont work with old files,

*added 4 Unique Dwarf followers **THEY NEED DWEMERBEARDS MOD 0.8**

* Dourin, Bomgar in Dragonsreach, Gunnor and Taffer in Warmaidens (Whiterun)


LOAD ORDER:
Racecompatability.esm
DwarfsRace.esm
DwemerBeards.esp
DwarfsRaceFollowers.esp

---------------IMPORTANT NEED TO KNOW--------LOOK UNDER HERE--------------------------------

IF BEARDS ARE NOT SHOWING UP ON FOLLOWERS. OR YOU WANT DIFFERENT TYPES.

1.LOAD UP DWARFSRACEFOLLOWERS.ESP AND DWEMER BEARDS.ESP TOGETHER IN CK MAKE DWARFSRACEFOLLOWERS.ESP THE ACTIVE FILE

2.UNDER ACTOR> DWARFS RACE. EDIT E.G. DRFDOURIN> RIGHT SIDE MENU CHARACTER GEN PARTS.

3. DRAG DWEMMER BEARD OR GASH SCAR ETC ETC FROM THE MAIN LEFT PANEL UNDER CHARACTER>> HEAD PART>> MALE>> TYPE DWEMER IN SEARCH BAR AND PICK WHAT YOU WANT....GIVE EM MORE SCARS OR WHATEVER.
4.THEN CTRL+F4 TO EXPORT FACEGENDATA FROM THEIR DWARFS RACE MENU ON LEFT PANEL. THEN SAVE.
DONE......

You can also change there voice in traits tab on character gen parts in the Creation Kit

****CLOTHING AND ARMOR MODS FOR DWARFS******.

Pauldrons to make them even more wider: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26617

ULFRIC BOOTS: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5702

Clothing Grimoa:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17401

Game of Thrones or Armonizer Pack: for bigger armors/boots.

Skaal heavy armor : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32126

WEAPONS: hothtrooper44, hammerhorde and Ghosus.
Armour: CaBaL120, frankdema, Natterforme and newermind43, grimoa, Armonizer



@SPECIAL NOTE@

When making the characters push most sliders to either top or bottom to pronounce their heads and faces to make them wider and more dwarfish.

Base skills are increased so is health and stamina.
Height: Male 1.0 {} Female .95. Its best to SET YOUR OWN Heights player.setscale .90 or whatever.
use console command setscale to change height of npc.



****CHANGELOG******
NEW VERSION 4.... All files cleaned...I got better at modding

3.3: Delete old mod before installing new Update. Added 3 followers and new esm file

Thanks to Anuiel for his amazing Dwemer Beards


******ENDORSEMENTS*******

If your a fan of Warhammer, Gimli, Gotrek, Grimnar, Grugni, drinking, burping, farting and slaying all manor of vile creatures of the deep. Then please give us some endorsements to get this mod noticed:]]]]]

Thanks Enjoy.
author: GPM26 and Anuiel for dwemer beards
